bannedDependencies.message: Velocity 1.4 is banned, org.apache.velocity:velocity should be used instead. You probably added a dependency that is missing the exclusions.
commons-logging conflicts with slf4j. You probably added a dependency that is missing the exclusions.
commons-vfs 1.0 has a potential security vulnerability (osvdb-58760). Use org.apache.commons:commons-vfs2:2.0 or greater
Apache commons xmlrpc with versions less than 3.1.3 expose a potential security vulnerability (osvdb-68314). Use org.apache.commons:xmlrpc-* 3.1.3 or greater
Plexus IoC container is phased out, use Sisu Inject Plexus instead!
plexus-component-api conflicts with newer plexus-container-default. You probably a plexus component made with older plexus container.
Nexus has being updated to use apache shiro instead, please remove jsecurity dependency
commons-beanutils includes commons-collections. use commons-beanutils-core instead
xml apis got banned since they are already included on java 6
Must use aether 1.8.1 or newer
junit:junit includes old versions of hamcrest; use junit:junit-dep instead
junit:junit-dep 4.9 wrongly includes hamcrest api in jar, 4.10 or greater required due to TestRule changes over earlier versions
mockito-all includes third party classes within it - use mockito-core instead
Make sure you are using the hamcrest version defined in parent
Use more specific hamcrest dependencies like hamcrest-core, hamcrest-library
litmus-testsupport greater than 1.3 required
Make sure to use the slf4j version defined in nexus parent. See slf4j.version property
Do not use log4j api directly in tests. Use slf4j api instead
Use the Eclipse/Jetty version defined in nexus parent. See jetty.version property
Use servlet API from Jetty 8.x (org.eclipse.jetty.orbit:javax.servlet)
Use org.sonatype.sisu:sisu-ehcache instead of plexus-ehcache
